paragraph: Chris Jenkins is an American sound engineer. He has won three Academy Awards for Best Sound and was nominated for two others in the same category. He has worked on more than 150 films since 1979.
Jenkins has won three Academy Awards for Best Sound and was nominated for another two:
Mad Max: Fury Road (2015) (with Ben Osmo and Gregg Rudloff)NominatedDick Tracy (1990)
